title: Revenue and taxation; governing authorities of counties may provide facilities in multiple locations for hearings on appeals to boards of equalization; provide

abstracts.abstract: A BILL to be entitled an Act to amend Article 5 of Chapter 5 of Title 48 of the Official Code of Georgia Annotated, relating to uniform property tax administration and equalization, so as to provide that the governing authorities of counties may provide facilities in multiple locations for hearings on appeals to boards of equalization; to provide that a hearing shall be held in the location nearest to the taxpayer's residence; to require the random assignment of hearing panel members to such locations; to provide for related matters; to repeal conflicting laws; and for other purposes.
